```diff
+ export interface BlogPost {
+   id: string;
+   title: string;
+   description: string;
+   content: string;
+   slug: string;
+   publishedAt: string;
+   updatedAt?: string;
+   status: 'draft' | 'published' | 'archived';
+   category: string;
+   tags: string[];
+   author: {
+     name: string;
+     bio?: string;
+     avatar?: string;
+   };
+   featuredImage?: string;
+   readingTime: number; // in minutes
+   excerpt?: string;
+   seo?: {
+     metaTitle?: string;
+     metaDescription?: string;
+     keywords?: string[];
+   };
+ }
+ 
+ export interface BlogCategory {
+   id: string;
+   name: string;
+   description: string;
+   slug: string;
+   color?: string;
+ }
+ 
+ export interface BlogFilters {
+   category?: string;
+   tag?: string;
+   search?: string;
+   status?: 'draft' | 'published' | 'archived';
+ }
+ 
+ export interface BlogSortOption {
+   field: 'publishedAt' | 'title' | 'readingTime' | 'updatedAt';
+   direction: 'asc' | 'desc';
+ }
+ 
+ export interface BlogMetrics {
+   totalPosts: number;
+   publishedPosts: number;
+   draftPosts: number;
+   categories: number;
+   averageReadingTime: number;
+ } 
```
